Class JWKGenerator

java.lang.Object
scot.gov.scotaccountclient.JWKGenerator
public class JWKGenerator extends Object
Command line utility for converting private key files to JSON Web Keys (JWK) format.

This utility reads existing RSA or Elliptic Curve private key files (PEM format) and converts them to JWK format with proper metadata including key ID, usage, and issue time, following the exact patterns described in the Nimbus JOSE+JWT documentation.

Usage:

  • java JWKGenerator --file private-key.pem --use sig
  • java JWKGenerator --file ec-private-key.pem --use enc
  • java JWKGenerator --file rsa-private-key.pem --use sig --public-only

Version:
2.0
Author:
ScotAccount Team

      private void convertPrivateKeyToJWK(String keyFile, String keyUse, boolean publicOnly) throws Exception
      Loads a private key from a file and converts it to JWK format.
      Parameters:
      keyFile - Path to the private key file
      keyUse - The intended use of the key ("sig" for signature, "enc" for encryption)
      publicOnly - Whether to output only the public key
      Throws:
      Exception - if key loading or conversion fails

      Parameters:
      keyFile - Path to the private key file
      Returns:
      The loaded private key
      Throws:
      Exception - if the key cannot be loaded

      privateKey - The EC private key
      Returns:
      The corresponding EC public key

      Exception - if public key derivation fails

      Returns:

      Throws:
